ygData.subject: RE: Deitie Recipes *SPOILER*
ygData.msgSnippet: Well on the attempt of 4 of each I did not Fail once & they were both Trivial to me with 136 or so skill so they are not really hard to make. Nice stats on
ygData.messageBody:
Well on the attempt of 4 of each I did not Fail once & they were both
Trivial to me with 136 or so skill so they are not really hard to make. Nice
stats on them for pottery stuff, but they are bugged. They are Clr, Shm, &
Dru only & can not be equipped. Maybe soon though. I bugged it & will bug it
again today when I log on. I always petition a bug cause the /bug command
does not always go through.

Battlestaff Fuzzietoe, Mithaniel Marr
41rst Ranked Druid of Karana
Master Brewer, Master Baker, Master Potter, Master Fletcher

-----Original Message-----
From: Xillitil of Povar [mailto:Xillitil@...]
Sent: Friday, February 25, 2000 8:00 PM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Potters] Deitie Recipes *SPOILER*


From: "Xillitil of Povar" <Xillitil@...>

thanks for trackin the recipes down for us :)

happen to know if they are trivial or not at the previous max skill
(168 or whatever)? is always nice to improve one's skills...

Xillitil/Povar
Master Fletcher, Master Potter, Master Smith, Master Brewer, Master Baker,
Master Jeweler, Master Fisher, aspiring tailor and tinker :)


>From: "Battlestaff Fuzzietoe" <andrie@...>

>Ok You want them here they are. I hope every one enjoys them. I got these
>of
>the Everquest MB. They were posted Berg Tunarbos. So thanks Berg
>
